ca.uqac.lif.labpal.server

Class LabPalServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.jerrydog.Server
      • ca.uqac.lif.jerrydog.InnerFileServer
        • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.server.LabPalServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler

    public class LabPalServer
extends ca.uqac.lif.jerrydog.InnerFileServer
    Server supporting LabPal's web GUI
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int m_colorScheme
      A number identifying the color scheme used in the GUI
      protected ExperimentPageCallback m_experimentPageCallback
      The callback for the individual experiment page
      protected Laboratory m_lab
      The instance of lab this server is responsible for
      protected static int s_cacheInterval
      The time (in seconds) during which the client is allowed to cache static resources (such as images or JS files) locally
      protected static List<String[]> s_colorSchemes
      The predefined color schemes used for the GUI
      static int s_defaultPort
      The default port

      • changeLab

        public void changeLab(Laboratory lab)
        Changes the laboratory associated with each registered callback. This occurs when the user loads a new lab from a file.
        Parameters:
        lab - The new laboratory

        protected static List<String[]> loadSchemes()

      • exportToStaticHtml

        public byte[] exportToStaticHtml()
        Exports the whole contents of the lab as a zipped bundle of static web pages.
        Returns:
        An array of bytes, with the contents of the zip file generated
